about_the_game:
The second game of Mad Miner, a dystopia where humans are forced to live in mines, takes place in the third dimension! Our main character joins the research team as a miner on a mission to dig deeper with his pickaxe.

What does the demo include?

  • In the demo of Mad Miner 2 you will be able to use all the mines, items and resources included in the demo.

  • You will be able to save your progress in the demo, but you will not be able to load it. Don't worry! You will still be able to play all your progress from the demo in the full version.

  • You will be able to experience the Mad Mod Editor and learn how to use it. But you won't be able to export your mods. Therefore, when the full version is released, you will be able to continue using the Mad Mod Editor you learned how to use without any problems.

  • In Mad Miner 2, you'll need to buy new floors to go deeper, but you won't be able to go down to the lower floors in the demo.

  • While Mad Miner 2 includes Steam achievements, the demo will not include achievements and Steam Auto Cloud systems. So don't delete your saves from your disk to avoid losing your progress in the demo.

  • That's all there is to it. Enjoy the indefinite demo fun!
